HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Home Page
HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Discover various exciting connections and explore your desires in a safe and discreet environment. Join a vibrant community of people seeking passionate and intense relationships.
HOME_PAGE.AGE_VERIFICATION_MESSAGE: This site is intended for people aged 18 and over. By continuing, you confirm that you are of legal age to explore content aimed at an adult audience.

CAROUSEL.IMAGE_1_TEXT: Finding our soulmate is always complicated.
CAROUSEL.IMAGE_2_TEXT: There are many apps, social networks, dating sites, and yet we are still looking for true love.
CAROUSEL.IMAGE_3_TEXT: When it comes to love and the right person, why waste time? At Naked Love, we got rid of all filters and clothes to see if there is a more instinctive way to find it.
CAROUSEL.IMAGE_4_TEXT: How do we find the right person? It would be good to avoid mistakes, unpleasant surprises, and especially wasted time. At Naked Love, we have the perfect way to find your soulmate.
CAROUSEL.IMAGE_5_TEXT: What does it take to fall in love, what sparks the spark, and what influences us in choosing a partner? At Naked Love, we have the opportunity to discover a partner and start as we end, naked.
CAROUSEL.IMAGE_6_TEXT: How long does it take to fall in love? For science, seconds; for poets, a lifetime is not enough.

SECURE_CONVERSATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Be kind. Respect others and treat them as you would like to be treated.
